item.description:
Colloquium; "Saving the Elephants"

Part of the "Nature and the Good Life" Series
Friday, March 9, 2007 - 10:00 a.m. - Noon (Meet at 9:30)
Photonics Center, Colloquium Room 9th Floor, 8 Saint Mary's Street
Moderator: Simon Keller, Boston University

David Schmidtz, University of Arizona on "Saving the Elephants"
Respondent: Ronald Sandler, Northeastern University

RSVP limit:
item.name: "Saving the Elephants" (Karbank Symposium in Environmental Philosophy)
